701806f-a.title: Bronx: Soundview Avenue - Randall Avenue
701806f-a.text:
Soundview Avenue, at the N. E. corner of Randall Avenue, show.
ing the Franciscan Friary. On the right is Publio School No. 69.
August 21, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
701806f-a.folder: Soundview Avenue & Randall Avenue, Bronx, NY
